projects.title: Marvel Characters
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application that implements MVC and CRUD architectures to consume Marvel API characters and display them, allowing users to create new characters and update-delete the existing ones.

projects.title: PHP Motors
projects.description: Constructed a dynamic website that allows users to authenticate and create reviews. Used sessions and cookies to log in.

projects.title: Disney Movies
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application that displays famous Disney movies and allows users to create movie reviews. Created a RESTfu1l API (GitHub Repository - Live API) enabling data to be stored in an online database and built a website to consume the RESTful API.

projects.title: Flowers E-commerce
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce website that allows users to authenticate and interact with products and services. Implemented a transactional email API service to reset the account password.

projects.title: Syphus Budget
projects.description: Developed a mobile application with a class team that assists users in tracking cash flow (income and expenses).

projects.title: Income & Expense Tracker
projects.description: Created a JavaScript application that tracks usersâ€™ income and expenses. Implemented localStorage property to save records in the browser.
